name: Community
about: The CSA Community Award is active from 0 to 50 hours and EARNED when 50 hours are accomplished.

name: Service
about: The CSA Service Award is active from 51 hours to 200 hours and EARNED when 200 hours are accomplished.

name: Achievement
about: The CSA Achievement Award is active from 201 hours to 500 hours and EARNED when 500 hours are accomplished.
